about.head: About Us
about.title: About Us
about.description: T&S Machine Movers (M) Sdn Bhd is a machine moving company established in 2010. Our first office was located in Kangkar Terbau. In July 2017, we relocated to Taman Impian Emas. Our company specializes in machine moving. We provide one-stop related services to meet all customer needs. Our services range from moving, lifting, shifting machines, crating & uncrating, machine dismantling and installation, and logistics services.
about.additional: We are renowned for providing excellent and reliable machine moving services. Our dedicated team of movers and consultants strive for excellence, and we believe that regardless of the size of the job, our team can provide solutions for all your needs.
about.cidb_description: T&S Machine Movers (M) Sdn Bhd is a machine company certified by the Construction Industry Development Board (CIDB), mainly engaged in construction engineering (B04) and civil engineering (CE21).

services.head: Explore Our Services
services.title: Our Services
services.moving_lifting_desc: Using different custom-made equipment for different environments to ensure safety and zero damage.
services.crating_desc: We provide customized crates and ordinary packaging / vacuum packaging to protect your equipment.
services.dismantling_desc: Skilled personnel to dismantle and install all kinds of machines.
services.logistic_desc: We also provide logistics services (Transportation, Shipping, Import & Export, Forwarding and etc)
services.logistics_desc: We also provide logistics services (Transportation, Shipping, Import & Export, Forwarding and etc)

equipment.title: Our Equipment
equipment.description: T&S Machine Movers (M) Sdn Bhd provides Forklift, Self Loader, Lowbed, Fassi Crane and Big Cargo for customers.

service_detail.moving_lifting_desc: Our experienced technicians can adapt to the changing needs of different customers. We use different equipment in different environments to ensure safety and zero damage.
service_detail.crating_desc: Skilled technicians can customize crates to protect your machine etc. We provide cost-effective solutions to custom make our crates, be it normal pack / vacuum pack.
service_detail.dismantling_desc: We help you solve the relocation problems and provide technicians to dismantle or install various machines. Our service range from dismantling, moving, shifting, transporting, unloading and installation.
service_detail.logistics_desc: We also provide logistics services such as:- Transportation, Shipping, Forwarding and Import & Export
